ðŸ“– Summary: Airweave is a tool that enables agents to search across various applications by transforming their content into searchable knowledge bases. It provides a standardized interface accessible through REST API or MCP, handling auth, extraction, embedding, and serving. Airweave essentially builds a semantically searchable MCP server.
